bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition with recurrent heart pain and acute panting. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 23: 心腹脹滿刺痛， 氣息喘急，傍攻兩脅，上衝心胸，瘥後複發，停遁不消，故謂之遁屍也 , “The heart and abdomen are distended with a feeling of fullness and piercing pain. Breathing is a hectic panting. In one’s sides it affects both flanks. Above, it rushes against the heart and chest. Once it has healed it breaks out again. It may stop as if it had run away, but it has not dissolved. Hence it is called ‘ run-away corpse [qi] ’”.
